title: Rare Visual Token Enhancement Improves Registration and Few-Shot Change Detection in Remote Sensing Data
content: This paper introduces the self-supervised pretext task of rare visual token enhancement: given an image, the model is trained to push the rarest visual tokens far from all the others. This pretext task slightly-but-consistently improves baseline performances for both registration and few-shot change detection on OSCD, LEVIR-CD and S2looking.
